caption: On a bed, a chubby man is lying, appearing to be in a critical condition. There are several people around him, both men and women. The man says something, and those around him are deeply saddened. Afterward, he dismisses the others, leaving only one other man behind. He shares some memories of the past with this man and then, while on his deathbed, writes a will and hands it over to him. He then passes away.Following this, the man with the will leaves the room, and there are people outside who are also grieving. It seems like the man is investigating something, and he asks some questions like "What happened?" or "What is going on?"
